DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate safety performance CorPath 200 System remote delivery manipulation guidewires rapid exchange catheter use percutaneous vascular intervention .
DOC.brief_title: Robotic-Assisted Peripheral Intervention Peripheral Arterial Disease II
DOC.detailed_description: This prospective , single-arm , single center , non-randomized feasibility study CorPath 200 System examine performance complete intervention ( DCB , Stenting ) femoropopliteal artery patient outcomes 30 day .
DOC.criteria: General Inclusion Criteria At least 18 year age ; Symptomatic disease : presence critical limb ischemia ( include tissue loss rest pain ) , lifestylelimiting claudication require intervention femoropopliteal artery ; The subject inform nature study agree provision provide write informed consent . Angiographic Inclusion Criteria Femoropopliteal artery lesion ( ) stenosis ( > 50 % ) occlusion 120 mm length determine imaging ( MRA Angio ) prior index interventional procedure . General Exclusion Criteria If follow criterion meet , subject enrol study : Failure/inability/unwillingness provide informed consent ; Target vessel previously treat bypass ; Enrolled concurrent clinical study . Angiographic Exclusion Criteria â€¢ Target vessel : Shows evidence previous dissection perforation , Has adjacent acute thrombus ; Has preexist target artery aneurysm perforation dissection target artery prior initiation interventional procedure .
